EmailTemplate.name: HWBR-202305-CHTPA-CC-Reputation.Follow-up Email (Thank you for attending)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for attending our recent Virtual Partner Summit. We will be sharing the recordings from all of the sessions in future emails. Please take a short survey to share your feedback on our program. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
